title: Old Cap
description: This hat has been sitting in a chest for who who knows how long. Still- it's a nice fit.
location: Can be found in the Cave of Awakening.

title: Blue Cap
description: According to legend, this cap was crafted for a hero who aided the Zora in their hour of need. It allows the wearer to swim with great speed. Gives the entire Zora armor effects.
location: Can be found in the Zora City Shop.

title: Green Cap
description: The forest children found this cap, clutched in the hands of a stalfos who'd stopped moving. It makes the wearer feel lighter than air. Gives the entire Climbing Gear armor effects.
location: Can be found in the Great Deku tree shop.

title: Red Cap
description: According to legend, this cap was crafted for a hero who aided the Gorons in their hour of need. It provides superb protection from heat. Gives the entire Flamebreaker armor effects.
location: Can be found in the Goron City Shop.
